name: SEO Optimizer
author: Ajay Kumar

sections.description:
SEO Optimizer: A Simple WordPress SEO plugin

Meta and title description templating, for snippets in the search results.
SEO Optimizer is simple and lightweight but powerful SEO plugin for beginners level.
sections.installation:
1. Install either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Once the plugin is activated you will see ‘SEO Optimizer’ in admin pages.
  4. Deactivate other seo related plugin before using it.
  5. Simple but powerful. Enjoy!

short_description: Improve your WordPress SEO: Add custom title and all necessary meta tags to fully optimized WordPress site using the SEO Optimizer.
